Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.4 Hetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika » 2.4.1 Kusalapada » 2.4.1.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika
Kusalapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
47.
1362Hetuñceva sahetukañca kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
1363Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
1364Hetuñceva sahetukañca kusalañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
48.
1365Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava…pe…  kamme nava, āhāre nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
